name: asocial.sysrq.in
title: Cyberia
short_description: Cyberia is a little Fediverse safespace :3
description:
Welcome to Cyberia! We're happy you're considering to toot with us and taking the time to read our policy.

# User Policy

## Scope and Audience

This policy is for users who have their accounts on sysrq.in. There is a separate peering policy for deciding when and how to federate with other instances. Generally, for users on the instance a higher standard applies.

Our instance is only available to users for personal use. Accounts with a commercial background should look elsewhere. Promoting your own work is okay, as long as it is not the focus of your account.

## Intent and Remedies

Our guiding principle for remedies is that of intent and willingness to correct ones own behavior. It is okay if you fuck up. But we expect you to correct your behavior as soon as we point it out.

Please approach the moderation team with any issues or questions about this policy, or any other policy in this document. We're always happy to expand in the rationale of these policies and provide advice about being excellent to each other.

If you disagree and reject our requests to fix your behavior, maybe this isn't the right instance for you.

## Banned Content

Content that is illegal in the Russian Federation is subject to suspensions. Independent from their legal status, any depictions of minors in a sexual context, real or imagined, is banned and will lead to suspensions.

## Prohibited Content

We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, transphobia and ableism.

Do not explicitly endorse systems of oppression as a remedy to the same. This especially applies to the myth of meritocracy.

Do not argue for the existence or relevance of reverse-racism or reverse-sexism. Racism and sexism are deep structural issues with culture and not the expression of single persons.
Content Warnings

We ask all users to make use of the Content Warning ("CW") feature in GoToSocial extensively. While this is a hard requirement for any adult or disturbing content, particularly involving discussion about prohibited content, we highly encourage using it as a general disclaimer regarding the content of your toot.

If someone asks you to add a warning to a particular type of content, it is generally a good idea to follow through.

## Personal Pronouns

We highly encourage you to add your pronouns to your profile and check your fellow users profiles for pronouns before engaging in conversation with them.

## Discussions and Debate

If you want to start an argument, it is better to ask if the person you're engaging would be interested in hearing your take first. We're trying to build a space where everyone feels comfortable being themselves, not a debate club. When you're asked to disengage, do so.

## Data usage

All original content shared on sysrq.in is the sole property of its creator. This data may not be used, published, or reproduced in any place other than Mastodon and related federated platforms, for any reason, without explicit permission granted on a user by user basis. Any datamining or harvesting operations without full prior consent of all affected users are not permitted on sysrq.in.

# Peering Policy

## Scope

This policy is for anyone on the fediverse who wants to interact with our users or join our relay. There is a separate user policy for accounts hosted on sysrq.in.

## Banned Content

Content that is illegal in the Russian Federation is subject to suspensions. Independent from their legal status, any depictions of minors in a sexual context, real or imagined, is banned and will lead to suspensions. For instances where such content is legal, a media block silence is enforced instead.

## Prohibited Content

We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, transphobia and ableism.

Instances that do not moderate such content might be silenced or suspended, based on severity. Outright fascism for instance will be suspended, while reactionary ideology will usually be silenced.

## Harassment

Instances hosting users that do not follow our "disengage on request" policy or send messages that can be construed to fall into our definition of prohibited content may be silenced or suspended based on severity. If the severity is not too high the user should be silenced or suspended first before a grace period where the instance moderation team is given time to rectify the situation.

name: b612.me
title: B612星球 - Asteroid B612
short_description:
B612是小王子的小星球(建站三周年快乐)
因为很小，所以容纳不了多少人。
这里是温馨的树洞，欢迎来到这里吐槽、记录生活。
本站用户域名为b612.me 出于安全原因考虑，访问本站时请使用b612.icu使用app时也请使用这个域名）


今天你能看到多少次日落呢？


本站活跃人数很少（冷清清~），不大适合追求社交与关注的朋友，也不太适合作为额外的静默魂器~注册前请三思！
description:
Asteroid B612
B612是小王子的小星球。因为这里很小，所以容纳不了多少人。
这里是温馨的树洞，欢迎来到这里安心地吐槽、记录生活。
小狐狸说：“真正重要的东西，用眼睛是看不到的。”；在背后，我会尽力维护这个实例，确保可用性，但天下没有不散的宴席，也请多多备份数据，防止服务意外中断。
虽然这里不会有审查，但请注意，各类特别过激、煽动性的政治观点以及仇恨言论仍不受欢迎。
本站在Mastodon的主域名为：b612.me，但为了防止海外访问不稳定的因素，本站直接访问域名为b612.icu。
您在本站的用户标识可以选以下几个域名：
@用户名@b612.me (主域)
@用户名@b612.icu
@用户名@b612.in
祝您在此玩的开心愉快，也祝您生活顺利，永远保持一颗积极乐观的心~

name: myidanonymous.me
title: MYID
short_description:
MYIDverified.me coming soon to protect your blockchain assets/cryptomoney from theft and even negligent password loss! Brought to you by "The Money Project" by OkGlobal Coin SWITCH-MYID.

Decentralized social network to protect the human right to free speech and spread of information to be discussed openly and proven correct or false.

User account content and followers are owned by the account user. Users are able to migrate content and followers to other servers or their own for any reason at anytime so long as the MYID server hosting the user's account is capable/functioning/operational.

MYID is a free, open-source social network server based on ActivityPub. All MYID servers are interoperable as a federated network (users on one server can seamlessly communicate with users from another one, including non-MYID software that implements ActivityPub)! MYID is free, open-source software licensed under AGPLv3. The public github repository is available at https://github.com/YouGotHacked001/MYIDanonymous.

This is a mastodon instance for witches. It is not for cops, feds, fash, TERFs, and/or abusers of any kind. If you are a witch please join us! If you are a cop, fed, fash, TERF, and/or abuser, go away forever.

Other federated services available on witches.live:
https://bophadees.witches.live - A Pleroma instance for experimentation, checking out Pleroma, and for wider communication with the fediverse. Less stable, no instance blocks.
https://hexagram.witches.live - A Pixelfed instance that is similar to Instagram that federates with a wide variety of federated platforms including Mastodon and Pleroma.

name: queer.af
title: queer.af
short_description:
queer.af, your cosy queer space
queer.af is a mastodon instance for those who are queer or queer-adjacent who would like a more pleasant social media experience.
description: 🏳️‍🌈 The best tl;dr for this instance would be “cosy queer space”. In light of Twitter’s recently more and more blatant veer towards full-on nazi platforming, and their history of banning queer people and separating us from our support networks for reasons such as “being suicidal”, “saying fuck” and “breathing”, this place exists as a refuge for those of us who are just tired of it all. We absolutely will not platform nazis, we will not ban people for reaching out for help from their network, and we will aggressively blacklist users and instances facilitating harassment of our members. You don’t have to be queer to sign up for an account, just don’t be a nazi, and don’t harass anybody. You can also sign up for an account at any other instance in the fediverse!

name: alive.bar
title: alive.bar
short_description:
你好，欢迎使用 alive.bar 社交媒体实例。
alive.bar 仅仅是一个服务器位于美国的网站，它使用了「长毛象（Mastodon）」服务。
description:
你好，欢迎使用 alive.bar 社交媒体实例。
什么是 alive.bar？
alive.bar 仅仅是一个服务器位于美国的网站。它使用了「长毛象（Mastodon）」服务。
如何使用 alive.bar？
使用邮箱注册后即可使用。（由于我们不能确保你所在的国家是一个法律健全、言论自由的国家，所以建议你不使用相应国家的邮箱进行注册。在发表言论前于物理端保护好自己是有必要的。）
虽然内在逻辑不同，但它的界面与 Twitter 或饭否颇为类似。
进入 alive.bar 后，请自由发言。
目前 alive.bar 并无社区公约，需要用户慢慢达成共识。但发表儿童色情、网络诈骗的信息，被管理员发现后会删除账号。
alive.bar 试图维持终生免费的使用体验，当服务器成本花费过高时，我们会采用「寻找绝不干涉 alive.bar 社区理念的赞助商」或「用户小额募捐」的形式，社区用户届时亦可以用投票的形式完成共同协商。

name: mastodon.klattgroup.eu
title: Klatt Group
short_description:
Moin und Willkommen auf der Mastodon Instanz von der Klattgroup.
Unsere Mastodon Instanz ist für alle Menschen und Betriebe geöffnet wir freuen uns auf einen offenen Austausch und viele neue Digitale Erfahrungen.
Wenn ihr neu im fediverse seit helfen wir euch gerne weiter eure neue Digitale Heimat zu erkunden. Als kleiner Tipp von uns für den Anfang Postet als erstes unter den #neuhier um neue Menschen im fediverse kennenzulernen. 
Der Sitzt unser Instanz ist im Herzen von Soest NRW es sind aber bei uns alle willkommen. 
Viel Spaß auf dem Server 
Dein Admin 
@jonathankla @klattgroup
description:
Fediverse (ein Kofferwort aus „federation“ und „universe“) oder Fediversum bezeichnet ein Netzwerk föderierter, voneinander unabhängiger sozialer Netzwerke, Mikroblogging-Dienste und Webseiten für Online-Publikation oder Daten-Hosting. Das Konzept kam 2008 mit GNU Social auf und verbreitete sich 2016 vermehrt mit Mastodon und dem 2018 vom World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) definierten Kommunikationsprotokoll ActivityPub.

Diese Instanz wird betrieben von der Klattgroup e.U.
die Klattgroup betreibt weitere fediverse Dienste im Internet unter anderem die Peertube Instanz https://cliptube.org/
weiter Dienste sind für die nächsten Jahre geplant und Vorschläge werden gerne angenommen.
Wir freuen uns dich bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen und Wünschen dir viel Spaß und Freude auf unserer Mastodon Instanz.

name: discourse.social
title: discourse.social
short_description: a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices, established by illumineX on November 7, 2022.
description: Discourse.social is a Mastodon instance for pro-democracy, pro-science voices. We founded Discourse.social because we believe that social media may have accidentally become an essential part of the global discourse for democracy. That global conversation probably won't be happening on Twitter, the platform on which it first emerged, for very much longer. Still, the conversation and the social graph that makes it possible has become vital. If you agree, please feel free to join us. If you would like to create a profile here, send email to me at: moose@discourse.social and include a link to your blog, Twitter profile or other social media presence, to help us see who you are. It helps us determine that you're not an imposter if you set up a profile at illumineX maker of EyeSpy, the cartoon eyes toy for Mac. We also make scalable mobile app and cloud systems for enterprise, government, and venture-capital-funded startup companies.

name: social.coop

short_description: A Fediverse instance for people interested in cooperative and collective projects.
description:
social.coop is a cooperatively-run corner of the Fediverse. The instance is democratically governed by its members, who generally share an interest in the co-op model, but topics of discussion range widely.

If you are interested in joining our community, please review our Bylaws and Code of Conduct. If you agree with them, you are welcome to join our community by applying at this link!

Our instance is supported by sliding scale contributions of $1-10/mo made via Open Collective. You must have an active Open Collective account to apply for membership; you may set one up here

name: fosstodon.org
title: Fosstodon
short_description: Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is open to anyone who is interested in technology; particularly free & open source software.
description:
Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is dedicated to Free & Open Source Software, or FOSS as many call it.

Fosstodon is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.

We're not just techies on Fosstodon though! We like to think of tech as the hobby that brings us all together, but it doesn't define us. That's why we encourage all our members to post about whatever interests them, not just tech (so long as it is allowed under our CoC).

name: floss.social
title: FLOSS.social
short_description: For people who care about, support, and build Free, Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS).
description: FLOSS.social was launched on 1 April 2018 as a Mastodon server for people who care about, support, or build Free, Libre, and Open Source Software (FLOSS). Of course, discussions aren't limited to just FLOSS -- let's share our unique interests! English is preferred for maximum conversation opportunities within the FLOSS community, but it is not required. Respect is required, however: Users on FLOSS.social agree to abide by the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct. This service was installed and is maintained in part by Masto.Host with equipment located at OVH, object storage provided by BunnyCDN, and outbound email via SparkPost. You can support this server financially through the Supporter Program, managed using the nonprofit & free software platform Liberapay.

name: flower.afn.social
title: マストドン（あふん）
short_description:
マストドンあふんサーバーです。
フラワーナイトガールが好きなひとが集まる場となったらいいなと思って作りました。
誰かを攻撃する発言、キャラクターをディスる発言、および犯罪につながる発言はやめてください。
description:
マストドンあふんサーバーでち。
フラワーナイトガールが好きなひとが集まる場となったらいいなと思って作ったでち。
誰かを攻撃する発言、キャラクターをディスる発言、および犯罪につながる発言はやめてほしいでち。


利用ルール


日本の法律を遵守して利用してください。犯罪を助長するもしくは犯罪に加担する行為は禁止です。


他人が不快になるような発言は行わないでください。他の人や組織を誹謗中傷する発言や画像は禁止です。ゲームやそのキャラクターを蔑む発言や画像は禁止です。


エログロなど18禁扱いとなる画像、および他人を不快にする可能性がある画像はNSFWタグを付けて投稿してください。ただし、NSFWタグを付けた場合でも法律に抵触する画像は禁止です。


フォロ爆などサーバへ過度に負担のかかる行為は禁止です。連投についてはある程度許容しますが、サーバに負担をかける場合や意味のない文字列の連投は禁止です。





ネタバレについて


メンテ前やメンテ中に実装前の花騎士の画像などを投稿する行為は禁止です。


ネタバレは他の人に配慮してください。キャラクターストーリーや小説などは、まだ読んでいない人もいるはずです。そのような話をする場合はCWタグを付けて行うのが好ましいでしょう。





発言について


語尾に「でち」等を付けて話す人が多く居ます。不快にならないでください。


語尾に「でち」「にゃしぃ」「ぴょん」をつけることを許可します。




寄付について


現在、受け付ける予定はありません

name: stereodon.social
title: Stereodon.social
short_description:
Stereodon.social è un social network autogestito e open source dedicato alla musica.
Stanchi di scambiarci informazioni tramite sistemi eticamente in contrasto con i nostri principi, abbiamo deciso di dar vita a questa istanza.
Siamo convinti che slegare la diffusione di musica da logiche competitive, possa favorire il fare comunità, quindi un maggiore e più sincero scambio di informazioni.


[ENG]

Stereodon.social is a self-managed social network devoted to underground music.
Tired of exchanging information through systems that are ethically in contrast to our principles, we decided to give life to this instance.
We are convinced that unlink the diffusion of music from competitive logics can favor making communities, therefore a greater and more sincere exchange of information.


languages accepted: Italian, English (for moderation reasons)

contact: admin [AT] stereodon.social
description:
Stereodon.social è un social network autogestito dedicato alla musica underground. Per maggiori informazioni leggi il nostro Manifesto. Per contattarci: admin [AT] stereodon.social

Qui altre istanze consigliate.

In addition to the Italian language, we also accept English. --- ENG Stereodon.social is a self-managed social network dedicated to underground music. contact us: admin [AT] stereodon.social

short_description: Tiggi.es🐯 is an LGBTQIA+🏳️‍🌈/Body Positive 👍🏾/Furry🐶/Tech💻/Geek🤓/Creative🎨/Automotive🚘/Maker🛠️/Gaming-centric👾 instance run by Burrs and pals
description:
Tiggi.es🐯 is an LGBTQIA+🏳️‍🌈/Body Positive 👍🏾/Furry🐶/Tech💻/Geek🤓/Creative🎨/Automotive🚘/Maker🛠️/Gaming-centric👾 instance run by Burrs and pals But really it's about sharing experiences and keeping things as Musk-free as possible. For those interested in the tech, Tiggi.es is run on a 3 node cluster consisting of: * 2x HP Elite 800 G9/i7-12700t with 64GB DDR5, 2x 2TB high write endurance PCIE 4.0 NVMe/3.84TB Enterprise SATA SSD * 1 HP Elite 600 G6/i9-10900t with 64GB DDR4, 2x 2TB high write endurance PCIE 3.0 NVMe/3.84TB Enterprise SATA SSD All running ProxMox Virtual Environment with replication and nightly backups to both RAID-6 and LTO-5. Connection is 5GBit Fiber. Located in Pflugerville, TX (Austin area)

name: glammr.us
title: glammr.us Mastodon
short_description: glammr.us is a space for folks interested in productive conversation about, well, galleries, libraries, archives, museums, memory work and records. It is pronounce “glamorous” as our work are often charmingly or fascinatingly attractive, especially in a mysterious or magical way. Sometimes it is also full of excitement, adventure, and unusual activity (oh, yes). It is also inspired by Toys’R’us to showcase the fun playful side of glammr.us tooters. But you don't necessarily have to only post about GLAMMR-related topics, bring your whole self. Talk about fun things you saw, your exciting day or even your struggles. Many of us are Twitter refugees looking for an inclusive and community supported approach to social media. If any of these things sound good to you, consider joining us by contributing as little as a $1 a month on our patreon to help keep our server online. Take a look at our code of conduct.

short_description: A community for people interested in long-term thinking that benefits everyone.
description: This is a place for people interested in balancing the liberal ideal of individual freedom and the conservative need for collective action, trying to find ways forward that help as many as possible while disadvantaging as few as possible. That doesn't mean everything is political. We're all real people doing everyday things trying to find our way through life. We're here to help each other be the best selves we can be. Areas of interest can include (but not be limited to) effective altruism, science, empathy, community building, and social resilience.

short_description: Sociale.network è un ambiente di confronto per pacifisti, anarcolibertari, ecologisti, antimilitaristi, anticlericalisti, antirazzisti, antifascisti e ogni altro genere di persone che sogna un mondo più pulito, solidale e libero. Il discorso d'odio è bandito, la pubblicità pure. Niente contenuti a pagamento, niente controllo da parte di qualche azienda privata, design etico e decentralizzazione! Su questo sito, grazie al software libero Mastodon, il proprietario dei tuoi dati sei tu! Senza pubblicità, senza paywall, senza algoritmi, senza cookies di profilazione, è indipendente, senza azionisti, investitori o gruppi/circoli/centri a cui dover riferire, senza tracciabilità. Sociale.network non è un social commerciale, non ha alcun scopo di lucro, nessuno ti spia, nessuno analizza cosa stai facendo, nessuna fastidiosa registrazione, niente dati personali, niente costi premium, nessuna notifica fastidiosa, nessuna email e niente banner pubblicitari. Sociale.network è una iniziativa dell'associazione culturale altrinformazione.net e dell'associazione peacelink.it

name: theres.life
title: There's Life
short_description: A family-friendly social network (Mastodon instance) devoted to the new life found in Christ.
description:
Greetings! This is a Christian instance dedicated to followers of Jesus Christ. Feel free to join. Overall, enjoy the fellowship of others.

If you would like to donate to keep this website going, please buy me a coffee at https://ko-fi.com/thereslife

If you do not receive a confirmation email upon setting up (or after we review your application), please contact @life@theres.life or email lifenetwork@pm.me

If for some reason the website goes down, go to https://about.theres.life. Bookmark it now so you can check it later.

What's Mastodon?

There's Life is an instance in the Fediverse running the Mastodon software (thus, a Mastodon instance). Which enables you to speak from your @theres.life account and communicate with people on other instances in the fediverse such as mastodon.social, qoto.org, and countless others. It's decentralized like email (I can send you a message from Yahoo mail to your Gmail account)

See MasterOfTheTiger's blog post on Decentralized Social Networks and Censorship for information about how decentralization prevents censorship.

Convinced yet? Join theres.life now! or find another instance to join.

Check out the Profile Directory to see a few of the interesting people current using There's Life.

name: mastodon.bachgau.social
title: Bachgau.Social Mastodon
short_description: Das soziale Netzwerk, für den Bachgau und den bayrischen Untermain. Willkommen sind alle aus der Region und darüber hinaus. Werdet ein Teil unserer Gemeinschaft, seid Willkommen!
description:
Dieser Server steht im Bachgau, einer Region im bayrischen Untermain, zwischen Aschaffenburg und Frankfurt.

Wir möchten alle Menschen aus dem Raum und darüber hinaus einladen, ein Teil unserer Gemeinschaft zu werden. Wir bieten eine schnelle und offene Kommunikationsplattform im Fediverse, abseits der kommerziellen Datenkraken.

So wie unserer Knoten ist das ganze Fediverse werbefrei, frei von Tracking und respektiert Eure Privatsphäre. Der Betrieb des Servers finanziert sich aus Spenden der Nutzer und ist damit frei von kommerziellen Einflüssen. Unter https://bachgau.social und https://wiki.bachgau.social erfahrt ihr mehr über das Soziale Netzwerk im Bachgau. Herzlich Willkommen!

Kennst Du schon unseren Blog zum Bachgau und der Umgebung? https://bachgau.social Projeket: Mastodon: https://mastodone.bachgau.social Friendica: https://friendica.bachgau.social Mobilizon: https://events.bachgau.social Pixelfed: https://pixelfed.bachgau.social Matrix: Server für Matrix Apps https://matrix.bachgau.social Element Web: https://element.bachgau.social Wie du uns unterstützen kannst: https://steadyhq.com/de/bachgausocial/about https://www.amazon.de/hz/wishlist/ls/2NATFVJEW9LX4?ref_=wl_share Folge dem Blog: https://www.bachgau.social/folge-dem-blog/

アンチハラスメントポリシー

ハラスメントとは、性差、性同一性と表現、性的指向、障害、外見や身体的特徴、人種、宗教、公共な場での性的な画像や類する表現、脅迫、ストーカー、望まない写真撮影や録音・録画、不適切な接触、およびそれらに関連した不快な言動が含まれます。
参加者が安心してコミュニティに集中できるよう、これらのハラスメント行為が行われないようにしてください。
私たちは、参加者へのハラスメント行為はいかなる形であれ容認しません。この原則に違反した参加者は、管理者の裁量により退場させられるものとします。また今後の参加が拒否される可能性があります。
これらの行為は、当コミュニティだけでなく、他SNSへの投稿、コメント等すべてにおいて認められないものとします。
これらのハラスメント行為を目撃した場合は管理者までご連絡ください。
私たちはすべての人が気持ちよくコミュニティに参加できるよう、尽力します。
皆様のご協力をお願いします。

name: hsnl.social
title: HSNL Social
short_description:
A fediverse server for the community of Dutch hackerspaces (HSNL)
contact: admin@hsnl.social
description:
The Fediverse is a decentralised federated social network. This server is maintained and used by hackers from The Netherlands (and elsewhere, probably). The software we use is glitch-soc, a fork of Mastodon.

Het Fediversum is een decentraal gefedereerd sociaal netwerk. Deze server wordt beheerd en gebruikt door hackers uit nederland (en vast ook elders). De software die we gebruiken is glitch-soc, een fork van Mastodon.

This server is currently hosted on a Hetzner CPX-31 node, with a NixOS config you can find here: https://github.com/hsnl-matrix/nixos
Nightly encrypted backups are sent to an AlphaVPS Storage box (pixie.town infra). Our email is hosted by Migadu.com, with a gracious 50% non-profit discount.

name: foresdon.jp

short_description: アストルティアの中にある mastodon サーバー……という設定の、ドラゴンクエスト X オンライン [非公式] サーバーです……が、ドラクエウォークやダイ大のハナシなんかも出ていますね！もちろんどのナンバリングタイトルやスピンオフであっても、どのキャラを推しても構いません♪
description:
ドラゴンクエスト X オンライン [非公式] mastodon サーバーです。

アストルティアの中にある mastodon サーバーなので、基本的にはアストルティアの住人として発言し、振る舞いましょう……という設定ですが、特に話題を限定しているワケではありません。別のドラクエの世界の話題やドラクエ以外の話題でも、ゆるゆるまったり遊んでもらえればと思います。

ドラクエ好きな人達がゆるく集まるサーバーとして "Fediverse (mastodon の連合でつながった世界)" の入口になったらいいな……そんな mastodon サーバーです。

詳細情報にもう少しちゃんとした説明を書いています。是非ご一読ください♪

name: club.darknight-coffee.eu
title: Darknight-Coffee-Treff
short_description: Hallo zusammen, ich bin #neuhier. Dabei doch gerne der #Entwicklung für neues #Klimaschutz zu 100 % für alle #Menschen in #Deutschland #Europa als #Kontinent. Auf der #Basis von #Software #Hardware #Proprietäre #open #sources #Software #GNU / #Linux #Debian #yunohost
description:
Die folgenden Regeln betreffen den Darknight-Coffee-Club Der Chat wird von Admins überwacht. 
Versionsgeschichte Diskussion (0) CHAT-REGELN. Widerrufsbelehrung Wer sich nicht an diese Regeln hält, wird verwarnt und ggf ausgeschlossen geblockt Konto gesperrt. Diese folgen gleich. Partner & Sponsoren Alle Regeln aus dieser Vorlage gelten auch für unsere weiteren Instanzen. Instanzen: Regeln Vorlage werden sich von zeit zu Zeit anpassen und immer auf den neusten Stand anpassen. Unser Team aus Mitgliedern Moderatoren und Beratern sorgt für Ordnung und kümmert sich um Regelverstöße, wenn sie diese mitbekommen oder es ihnen gemeldet wird. Aus diesem Grund brauchen wir einen Leitfaden für Tuts-kanal Darknight-Coffee. Best Greetz, Impressum ● Freundlichkeit & Höflichkeit hat oberste Priorität. Das Ziel von Darknight-Coffee-Toots ist es, eine optimale Chat.Toots-Twitter-Unterhaltung, die wir bereitstellen, bei der sich jeder willkommen und wohl fühlen soll. Regeln für Chat und Foren Spielregeln für die Kommunikation & Chatregeln. Die Teilnahme an digitalen Angeboten, egal ob synchron (Videokonferenzen) oder asynchron (Kursnotizbuch, Teams-Chat, Emailverkehr), ist ab Klasse 7 grundsätzlich verpflichtend. 8 Chat Regeln Vorlage May 23rd 2022 | Vorlagen madden Post. Klasse auf dem Wunschzettel. Unser Community-Darknight-Coffee.Club & den Instanzen der verschiedenen Bereichen!

https://netzspielplatz.org/stream

https://netzspielplatz.com/

https://darknight-coffee.de/

https://tube.darknight-coffee.org/

https://club.darknight-coffee.org/flarum/

https://darknight-coffee.org/blog/?page_id=33



veranschaulicht mit einigen Beispielen die grundlegenden Prinzipien unserer Philosophie. Zusätzlich zu unseren Nutzungsbedingungen haben wir Community-Richtlinien aufgestellt, in denen wir unsere Erwartungen an benutzergenerierte Inhalte und Aktivitäten auf und außerhalb von Instanzen darlegen. Damit das Chatten und Posten Spaß macht, ist es wichtig, dass wir fair miteinander umgehen. Während es sich ausweitet, gibt es keine gemeinsame Vorlage für den/ die Biografie, die für alle potenziellen gelten. Instanzen regeln, solange sie gegen keine Regeln verstoßen und bei Nicht Sachgemäser benutzung entfernt werden. Wir haben Bilder über chat regeln vorlage einschließlich Bilder, Fotos, Hintergrundbilder und mehr. Das nicht!" Regeln: Wir alle brauchen sie und Sie auch. Ein Dokument, das Sie an Freunde, Familienmitglieder oder Kollegen weiterleiten können, die sich unwissentlich dem sozialen Chat-Verhalten widersetzen. Ein Insider-Gag wird dann erst zum Insider-Gag, wenn auch alle wirklich „in-side“ sind – sonst ist er mehr so „un-cool“. Durch das positive Feedback angetrieben haben die Darknight-Coffee-Instanzen … Wer sich nicht an diese Regeln hält, wird verwarnt und ggf auf allen Instanzen gesperrt. description:
Primera instancia uruguaya de la red social Mastodon, federada, descentralizada, autogestionada y basada en software libre, inaugurada el 24 de abril de 2017. Si aplicás para registrarte, buscá el correo de registro en la carpeta de SPAM por las dudas. Nuestro cometido es crear un espacio de convivencia pacífica, pero no sin debates o intercambio de ideas. La base es siempre el respeto hacia las demás personas y el respeto por las normas del servidor. Construyamos una red social sin control corporativo, sin algoritmos y sin monetizar a los usuarios, entre todos y formando parte. Si te gusta el proyecto, puedes colaborar a mantener el servidor sin compromiso.

Leer las normas del servidor en --> https://mastodon.uy/about/more

name: persadon.com
title: پرسادون
short_description:
با دوستان خود گفتگو کنید و دوستان تازه پیدا کنید. عکس، ویدیو، و نوشته‌های خود را به اشتراک بگذارید. پرسادون یکی از سرورهای شبکهٔ اجتماعی بزرگ ماستودون است و می‌خواهد محیطی ایمن و پایدار برای کاربران فارسی‌زبان باشد. تا وقتی که به سیاست‌های کاربری و شرایط خدمات پرسادون احترام می‌گذارید، از بودن کنار شما در پرسادون خوشحال خواهیم شد.

راهنمای کاربری ماستودون در ویکی‌کتاب

دربارهٔ پرسادون
description:
پرسادون یکی از صدها سایتی است که در شبکهٔ اجتماعی بزرگ ماستودون با هم ارتباط دارند.

نام پرسادون ترکیبی از واژه‌های پرشین و ماستودون است. پرسادون می‌خواهد یک شبکهٔ اجتماعی ایمن و پایدار برای کاربران فارسی‌زبان باشد.

با وجود این که محیط پیش‌فرض پرسادون فارسی است، کاربران این سایت همچنان می‌توانند با همهٔ کاربران این شبکهٔ اجتماعی در سرورهایی غیر از پرسادون و با زبان‌هایی جز فارسی نیز ارتباط داشته باشند. حتی می‌توانید زبان پرسادون را روی هر زبان دیگری که خودتان دوست دارید نیز تنظیم کنید.

اگر می‌خواهید بیشتر با ماستدون آشنا شوید، راهنمای کاربری ماستودون را در ویکی‌کتاب بخوانید.

name: squid.cafe
title: 🦑 ☕️ Squid Cafe
short_description:
Below the thunders of the upper deep,
Far, far beneath in the abysmal sea,
His ancient, dreamless, uninvaded sleep
The Kraken sleepeth: faintest sunlights flee
About his shadowy sides; above him swell
Huge sponges of millennial growth and height;
And far away into the sickly light,
From many a wondrous and secret cell
Unnumber'd and enormous polypi
Winnow with giant arms the lumbering green.
There hath he lain for ages, and will lie
Battening upon huge sea-worms in his sleep,
Until the latter fire shall heat the deep;
Then once by man and angels to be seen,
In roaring he shall rise and on the surface die.
— "The Kraken" by Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1830
description:
This is Squid Café, a special (to me) Mastodon instance.

It is not focused on any particular niche interest, however, I am a fountain pen user/collector, hence the semi-related "squid" name. (Squid. Ink. Get it?) Also... Cephalopods. Analog/digital photography, science. It’s all good. Everyone is welcome as long as you follow the code of conduct.

Bow to your cephalopod overloards!

Welcome to fandom.ink

Inspired by the Great Tumblr Exodus of 2018, fandom.ink is a small instance designed for fans, fandom, and fandom content creators.

Code of conduct

While fans of all kinds are welcome, please note fandom.ink is a moderated instance and that members are expected to abide by the code of conduct.

Support us

Jalgi.eus, enpresa transnazionalek garatu eta kontrolatzen dituzten ohiko zerbitzuetatik ihes egin eta alternatiba askeak euskaraz eskeintzeko Izarkom Euskal Herriko Telekomunikazio Kooperatibak sortutako ekimena da. Ekimen honen baitan, mastodon.jalgi.eus baliabide aske eta sare banatuak erabiliaz Izarkomek #TeknologiaBurujabetza sustatzeko helburuarekin sortutako instantzia aurkezten dugu. Teknologia, Telekomunikazio eta Energia burujabetzak duten garrantziaz jabetuta, hauek elkarrekin uztartu eta gizarte burujabe baten norabidean, ondorengo baliabideak erabiltzen ditu mastodon.jalgi.eus instantziak: Zerbitzarien interneterako konexioa Izarkomen Telekomunikazio Operadoraren bidez Zerbitzarien ostatatzea Herrizoma Datu-Zentru autonomo eta banatuen bidez Zerbitzarien argindarra GoiEner Energia berriztatzaileen kooperatibaren bidez Instantziara sarbidea internetez gain, sare ireki, aske, neutral eta partekatuaren bidez ere egin daiteke.

name: dragon.style
title: Dragon Style
short_description: I'm a grumpy queer dragon lady and this is my quiet cave for me and some friends.
description:
Dragon Style

a Mastodon instance for dragons, and people who like dragons.

What's Mastodon? Mastodon is basically Twitter, except with less trolls and Nazis. And longer tweets.

It’s also Twitter without a whole bunch of VC investment that it needs to try and pay back by monetizing your eyeballs and keeping you on the site for as long as possible, regardless of whether that's by making you happy or enraging you.

And finally, the last big difference is that instead of living on a bunch of computers run by people working for Twitter, Mastodon lives on a bunch of computers run by whoever feels like running an “instance”.

Each instance can set its own policies. If you really want to be a jerk to people, you can find or start an instance that’ll let you! But people on other instances can very easily filter out not just you, but your entire instance. The hope is that this will keep things more civil than what Twitter has turned into. The reality is that there are probably exciting new failure modes somewhere in the future.

The policies of this particular instance can be found here. The TL;DR version of is "Imagine you have a cool queer aunt. Don't do anything that'd probably piss her off."

Porém se você for ativista desta causa e quiser estar nesta instância seja bem-vindo. Essa instância é moderada e a idade mínima para participar é de 18 anos. Nos propusemos a ser um espaço democrático e progressista para bate-papos, discussões e troca de experiências positivas. Abraçamos todas as pessoas em sua diversidade, e portanto o feminismo, o antiracismo, a diversidade étnica, religiosa, cultural, assim como qualquer iniciativa ou movimento que vise dar dignidade as pessoas, principalmente as menos privilegiadas.

name: social.politicaconciencia.org
title: Red social de Política ConCiencia
short_description:
¡Bienvenido!

    Política ConCiencia pone a tu disposición un foro de expresión que privilegia el diálogo informado y respetuoso entre los individuos. En lo esencial, los temas que nos ocupan pertenecen al ámbito de la política, la ciencia y la cultura, aunque los de interés general también son bienvenidos. Las publicaciones (toots) admiten hasta 750 caracteres. Aquí, hallarás un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin temor a ser censurado por tu postura ideológica, tus convicciones o tus creencias.

    Para favorecer un medio armonioso, nuestra instancia se apega a un Código de conducta, el cual debes revisar con detenimiento antes de registrarte (además de los Términos del servicio). No obstante, a manera de anticipo, debes saber que busca garantizar la libre expresión en el marco del respeto al derecho de los seres humanos a salvaguardar su dignidad e integridad psicológica y emocional.

    Así pues, si estás de acuerdo en que las conductas ofensivas que abundan en la mayoría de las redes sociales (insultos, ira, difamaciones, humillaciones o prácticas similares), son un obstáculo para el establecimiento de relaciones sanas entre los miembros de una comunidad, sin duda alguna, este sitio es para ti.

    Al ingresar a esta comunidad, podrás entablar contacto con cualquier persona que pertenezca a cualquier otra instancia de la red social Mastodon, lo cual amplía tus posibilidades de comunicación enormemente.

    Finalmente, considera que esta instancia no lucra con tu información personal, de modo que para subsistir requiere de tu participación. Si está en tus posibilidades, no dudes en donar. Con ello, estarás contribuyendo a la diversificación de los medios alternativos que fomentan la libertad de expresión y aumentarás las probabilidades de que este servidor, el cual será tu hogar en la federación de servidores de Mastodon, siga existiendo en el futuro.

    Para saber más, te invitamos a leer el apartado Información general y a consultar el manual ¿Cómo usarla?

Nutze Hashtags wie #freeyourstuff oder #foodsharing, die erst in deiner Nachbarschaft ihren wahren Wert entfalten. Vernetze dich in deiner Umgebung um mit Menschen zusammen zu kommen, die du auch im echten Leben einfach auf einen Kaffee treffen kannst. Beschäftige dich mit Themen und Menschen die dir nahe stehen - im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes. Schaffe dir ein lokales Netzwerk. Das alles mit Blick auf Gemeinnützigkeit, Privatsphäre sowie neusten Technik und Ethik-Standards.

## pt_BR

A bolha.us é uma instância moderada com um foco em usuários do Brasil, contudo, usuários de outros lugares e falantes de outras línguas também são muito bem vindos por aqui.

Construímos esse espaço para a comunidade TECH Brazuca progressista, social-democrata, formada por aquelas pessoas normalmente chamadas de "pessoas de esquerda" só porque querem um país mais justo, sem miséria, sem fome, inclusivo e humano.

Aqui entre outras coisas, falamos principalmente de IaC, CI/CD, Dev, Ops, Containers, Kubernetes e Cloud Native.

Esse é um cantinho para Geeks, Nerds e entusiastas de tecnologias úteis, ainda assim, saiba que não falamos só sobre TECH aqui, também falamos sobre a vida, o universo e tudo mais.

Discursos de ódio são proibidos. Usuários que não respeitem as regras serão silenciados ou suspensos, dependendo da severidade da violação.

Por favor leia o código de conduta e as regras de nossa instância.

Só vem!

Se quiser saber mais sobre a Bolha Tech acesse https://bolha.io.

## en_US

This is a moderated instance for Brazilian users, therefore, english and other languages are also accepted here.

We build this space especially for the Brazilian Tech community. Here – among other things - we love to talk about IaC, CI/CD, Dev, Ops, Containers, Kubernetes and Cloud Native. Join us!

This is a place for Geek people, but, here we also like to talk about the life, universe and everything else ;)

Hate speech is forbidden, please read the rules and code of conduct.

:)

---------------------------------->
Our team

@gutocarvalho, @amanda, @mbrescia @ayrtonfreeman, @gomex, @somatorio, @sebawebber, @carlosenog, @rogawa, @robertomurta, @lupatini

name: sciences.social

short_description: A place for social scientists to discuss their work and the world using the free & open Mastodon software. Please include your name and role in social science when signing up.
description: sciences.social is an online community for social scientists (as opposed to scientists who just want to be social). It's a place for the helpful and respectful, if occasionally contentious, discussions that happen in our hallways and sometimes happened on Twitter. Use this site to announce a paper acceptance or R&R, comment on recent research, ask for advice on syllabi, and more. To help keep things civil, we use our outside names and our inside voices. If you sign up, let us know your connection to social science and real name. An academic email address makes verification simple, but isn't required.

name: m.cmx.im
title: 长毛象中文站
short_description: 长毛象中文站是一个开放，友好，有爱的社区。长毛象中文站主题为喵，汪，各种动物，社交，科技，编程及生活。发言内容只要没有明显违法内容均不禁止。无论你的兴趣点是什么，我们欢迎友好、热情、乐于分享的朋友。
description:
CMX.IM是长毛象(Mastodon)的一个中文实例。Mastodon 是一个开源的、符合 GNU Social 规范的去中心化社交网络，整个长毛象社区是由无数实例组成的。注册本社区后你不仅可以与本实例内的用户互动，并且可以与来自世界各地的其他实例中的用户无缝连接。

长毛象中文站主题为喵，汪，各种动物，社交，科技，编程及生活。发言内容只要没有明显违法内容均不禁止。无论你的兴趣点是什么，我们欢迎友好、热情、乐于分享的朋友。

使用必读：安家前请先阅读本站详情页。

社区规则： 为了您安家后的使用体验，请详细阅读长毛象中文站社区规则。

使用指南： Mastodon 中文官方文档 (备用地址)

免翻墙备用镜像站： 我们提供备用地址，特供不方便使用VPN的中国用户不需翻墙访问本站。请登录后在网页版的站内公告栏获取免翻墙备用地址与使用方式。
